January 16, 1939
Mr. M. 8. Novlk
Municipal Broadcasting system
Municipal Building
New York City
Dear Mr. Novlk:
I wonder if you have available thirty
copies of the Masterwork Bulletin whioh J
might distribute to members of the National
Associatlonsof Educational Broadcasters.
Or, if you prefer, I will send you a lis^
of our members so that you may mall copies
direct.
Sincerely yours,
Frank E. Sohooley
